CustomField.formula: "Lead – new lead to be nurtured/new lead." +BR() + "CONNECTED/CONTRACTED:"+ BR()+ "....."+"Left message:" +BR() + ".........."+"Lead is automatically scheduled the next touchpoint – 48 hours and 7 days are the touchpoints " +BR()+ "....."+"Scheduled call back " +BR()+ ".........."+"Calendar with date and time to select" +BR()+ "SCHEDULED - SERVICE/APPOINTMENT" +BR()+ "....."+"To be discussed – once they attend appointment, are the automatically converted to “Attended” or No Show" +BR() + "....."+"Notifications if No Show (consults and injectables) back to 24 hours, 48 hours, 7 days" +BR() + "NO LONGER INTERESTED – lead that retracts request " +BR()+ "NOT A LEAD/INCORRECT DATA – sales/marketing call " +BR()+ "CLIENT – lead that has purchased" +BR()+ "MEMBER – lead that converts to membership"
CustomField.label: Lead Status Definitions
